name: Annoying Cab
description:
This is probably the funniest cab that you ever take!

Your goal is very simple! Text the answer as fast as you can for the annoying taxi driver, or he will kick you out of the cab!

Features:

- Fun stories!
- Challenging gameplay with texting fun!
- Unlock more crazy cab during your progress!
- Compare your score with friends via Game Center or Facebook.
- iOS 8 Smart Keyboard is supported, your texting skill will become even more crazy with much faster speed!
- Wonderful pixel art & retro music!
- Tons of achievements!

BE WARNED: By completing this game, you're mastered your modile keyboard. From that moment on, texting is as simple as breathing.
